subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Entering the Blue Grass Stakes at Keeneland, McCarthy had won 13 races over 18 years, but his horse, General Quarters won, and will race next in the Kentucky Derby.
snippet: Entering the Blue Grass Stakes at Keeneland, McCarthy had won 13 races over 18 years, but his horse, General Quarters won, and will race next in the Kentucky Derby.
